abstract: Boston Red Sox announce that Ben Cherington will replace Theo Epstein as the team's general manager.
snippet: Ben Cherington replaced Theo Epstein as general manager of the Red Sox, and announced that John Lackey will have Tommy John surgery and miss the 2012 season.
lead_paragraph: Ben Cherington replaced Theo Epstein as general manager of the Red Sox, and announced that John Lackey will have Tommy John surgery and miss the 2012 season.

headline.main: New Red Sox G.M. Pledges Only ‘Minor Changes’
headline.print_headline: At Fenway and Wrigley, Dark Clouds Part for a Day
headline.seo: New Red Sox G.M. Ben Cherington Pledges Only ‘Minor Changes’
